Package model.theme

Class ThemeManager

java.lang.Object
model.theme.ThemeManager
public class ThemeManager
extends java.lang.Object
A Manager used to handle all initialized themes.
Author:
TRAFNY Theo - UPSSITECH
See Also:
DarkTheme, LightTheme, Theme, Themes, ThemeValue
